en: From the late 1950s , after appearing in several successful films , she began to work with the emerging generation of French film - makers .
baseline: 从1950年代末起, 在几部成功的电影中出现后, 她开始与新兴的法国电影制作人一起工作.
zh: 从1950年代晚期起,在几部成功的电影中出现后,她开始与新兴的法国电影制片人一起工作.

en: Moreau went on to work with many of the best known New Wave and avant - garde directors .

en: In 1983 , she was head of the jury at the 33rd Berlin International Film Festival .
baseline: 1983年,她担任第33届柏林国际电影节陪审团主席。

en: In 2005 , she was awarded with the Stanislavsky Award at the 27th Moscow International Film Festival .
baseline: 2005年,她在第27届莫斯科国际电影节获得斯坦尼斯瓦夫斯基奖。

en: She released several albums and once performed with Frank Sinatra at Carnegie Hall in 1984 .
baseline: 她在1984年与弗兰克·西纳特拉(Frank Sinatra)一起在卡内基大厅演出。

en: In addition to acting , Moreau worked behind the camera as a writer , director and producer .

en: Nida was born in Oklahoma City , Oklahoma on November 11 , 1914 .

en: In 1937 , Nida undertook studies at the University of Southern California , where he obtained a master 's degree in New Testament Greek in 1939 .
baseline: 1937年,尼达在南加利福尼亚大学学习,1939年获得新约希腊语硕士学位。

en: In 1943 , Nida received his Ph.D. in Linguistics from the University of Michigan .
baseline: 1943年,尼达从密歇根大学获得语言学博士学位。
zh: 1943年,尼达从密歇根大学获得语言学博士学位.
